artist: Engraver: Guiseppe Zocchi; Painter: After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Publisher: Thomas Bradford
description: Mars in armor holding sword; Cupid holding sword arm
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [Guercino inv\'t   Gius. Zocchi sc./ Cupid disarming Mars: from an Original Drawing of Guercino/ T. Bradford excudit., Fleet Street, 14th March, 1764]; on sheet in pencil: [1-508]; on verso upper right corner in pencil: [214]
title: Cupid Disarming Mars
